keyword: calories in a jack in the box taco
title: Calories in a Jack in the Box Taco
meta_description: Discover calories in a Jack in the Box taco, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Jack in the Box Taco
assumptions: Standard menu item: seasoned ground beef, cheddar cheese, lettuce, taco sauce in a corn tortilla; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on official Jack in the Box data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A Jack in the Box taco provides 142 kcal with 5 g protein and 11 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging or apps.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Jack in the Box taco?
What's the protein in a Jack in the Box taco?
faqs.a: About 5 g of protein per taco.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Jack in the Box taco?
Are Jack in the Box tacos low carb?
faqs.a: They have 11 g carbs per taco, with 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does adding sauce change calories in a Jack in the Box taco?
faqs.a: Yes, extra sauce adds about 20 kcal; standard includes some.
